name: Mona Lisa
painterQuote: Learning is the only thing the mind never exhausts, never fears, and never regrets.

name: The Last Supper
painterQuote: The greatest deception men suffer is from their own opinions.

name: The Persistence of Memory
painterQuote: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.

name: The Scream
painterQuote: All art, literature, and music must be born in your heart's blood. Art is your heart's blood.

name: The Starry Night
painterQuote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
